search_query: Gen Digital Norton Avast competitors 2024 consumer security
context: Gen Digital (rebranded from NortonLifeLock in 2022) operates as a Fortune 500 company with $3.8 billion in fiscal 2024 revenue, protecting ~500 million users across 150+ countries with 65 million+ paid customers and 77%+ retention rate. Portfolio includes Norton, Avast, LifeLock, Avira, AVG, ReputationDefender, and CCleaner following the completed NortonLifeLock-Avast merger (approved by UK CMA). Listed on NASDAQ and Prague Stock Exchange, the company competes in consolidated consumer cybersecurity market with both traditional antivirus vendors and cloud-native security providers.
